summary: THE VEHICLE WAS ON THE CITY STREET APPROACHING OUR PROPERTY WHEN THE TONGUE OF THE TRAILER BROKE COMPLETELY OFF OF THE TRAILER AT A LARGE HOLE DRILLED INTO THE BOTTOM OF THE TONGUE FRAME FOR THE WIRING TO ENTER THE FRAME WHERE THE TONGUE FRAME MEETS THE CARGO BOX.  THE TRAILER WAS DAMAGED AS IT CRASHED INTO THE BACK OF THE DUMP TRUCK AND THEN CAME TO REST ON THE GROUND.
